00374 inline void GHOST_SystemWin32::retrieveModifierKeys(GHOST_ModifierKeys& keys) const
00375 {
00376     keys = m_modifierKeys;
00377 }
00378 
00379 inline void GHOST_SystemWin32::storeModifierKeys(const GHOST_ModifierKeys& keys)
00380 {
00381     m_modifierKeys = keys;
00382 }
00383 
00384 inline void GHOST_SystemWin32::handleKeyboardChange(void)
00385 {
00386     m_keylayout = GetKeyboardLayout(0); // get keylayout for current thread
00387     int i;
00388     SHORT s;
00389 
00390     // save the language identifier.
00391     m_langId = LOWORD(m_keylayout);
00392 
00393     for(m_hasAltGr = false, i = 32; i < 256; ++i) {
00394         s = VkKeyScanEx((char)i, m_keylayout);
00395         // s == -1 means no key that translates passed char code
00396         // high byte contains shift state. bit 2 ctrl pressed, bit 4 alt pressed
00397         // if both are pressed, we have AltGr keycombo on keylayout
00398         if(s!=-1 && (s & 0x600) == 0x600) {
00399             m_hasAltGr = true;
00400             break;
00401         }
00402     }
00403 }
